text: Glenn E. Summers (February 19, 1925 â€“ February 16, 2020) was an American lawyer and politician. He was a Democrat. From 1947 to 1951, he served as a member of the Florida House of Representatives for Liberty County. Summers was born in Bristol, Florida. He died on February 16, 2020, at the age of 94. ==References== Category:2020 deaths Category:1925 births Category:Lawyers from Florida Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Members of the Florida Legislature
title: Glenn E. Summers
